SKTaskSchedulingPolicy - Interface in com.gnmathur.saarekaam.core.task
A scheduling policy for a task.
SKTaskSchedulingPolicy.Cron - Record Class in com.gnmathur.saarekaam.core.task
Cron: The task will be executed at a fixed time of the day.
SKTaskSchedulingPolicy.FixedNumberOfTimes - Record Class in com.gnmathur.saarekaam.core.task
FixedNumberOfTimes: The task will be executed a fixed number of times
SKTaskSchedulingPolicy.OneTime - Record Class in com.gnmathur.saarekaam.core.task
OneTime: The task will be executed after a fixed delay.
SKTaskSchedulingPolicy.Periodic - Record Class in com.gnmathur.saarekaam.core.task
Periodic: The task will be executed periodically after a fixed interval.
